item.title: Religion
item.description: Religion in Vekllei ğŸŒ‹ ARTICLE Documents ğŸŒº Note from the Editor This is a comprehensive article on the religion of Vekllei. If you’re looking for an article on the country, click here. ğŸšš Under Construction This page is still under construction, and is incomplete. 1. Overview # Upen is the nondenominational animistic spiritualism of Vekllei. It is both an organised religious belief system and a decentralised local animism, localised regionally across the Home Islands and beyond.

item.title: Vekllei Back Up
item.description: The Country of Vekllei ğŸŒº FEATURE Introduction ğŸŒº Note from the Editor This is a comprehensive article on the country of Vekllei. If you’re looking for an introduction to the project, click here. ğŸšš Under Construction This page is still under construction, and may be incomplete. 1. Overview # Vekllei is the utopian landscape of Hobart's ongoing Petticoat Project. Set ostensibly in Iceland, the society and geography of this country is radically different from our own, and explores new systems of living through a flexible alternate history.
